title: The best typewriter keyboards of 2023
description: Looking for a distraction-free typewriter that can connect to your tablet, phone, or laptop? Our picks for the best typewriter keyboards also include Azio, Freewrite, and more.

title: Do RFID blocking cards actually work? My Flipper Zero revealed the truth
description: Credit and debit cards contain RFID contactless technology. Can an RFID blocking card keep someone from "reading" your card without your knowledge? I put it to the test.

title: Picky about your coffee? This compact grinder has over 30 settings to brew the perfect cup
description: The Fellow Ode grinder lets you change the flavor profile of your coffee with a single dial. Here's how it works and why it's a must-have in my kitchen.

title: ChatGPT's 'accomplishment engine' is beating Google's search engine, says AI ethicist
description: Richard Socher, CEO of You.com, explains how AI and large language models are challenging Google's position at the center of our information universe.
